info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 4:27AM CDT until March 30 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL BENTON...NORTHWESTERN MADISON...WESTERN CARROLL AND NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 426 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of War Eagle to 3 miles northeast of Elkins, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Huntsville... Eureka Springs... Beaver... Hindsville... Withrow Springs State Park... War Eagle... Forum... Hobbs State Park... Grandview... Clifty... Wesley... Goshen... Rockhouse... Tuttle... Beaver Lake... Mayfield... Larue... Alabam... Pleasant Ridge... Best... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for northwestern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
